website_summaries.verdict: Perhaps not the most comprehensive beginners option, but for the complete novice, the included how-to guide can be of great help.
pros: Available in a range of sets, including drawing, acrylic, oil, and watercolor paints Affordable and convenient with all the necessary components to get started
Each set includes an instruction booklet and array of handy tools to help you get the most out of your first efforts right from the start
Reasonable price makes it possible to try out a number of different artistic media
Compact wood carry case is conveniently portable
cons: You’ll still need to purchase the appropriate sketch pads or painting paper
Basic contents are best for beginners

customer_reviews.title: The case for this art set is really nice and holds everything into place very well
customer_reviews.text: The case for this art set is really nice and holds everything into place very well. All the art supplies are nice quality. But the little booklet that comes with it didn't really explain beginning art very well. There were a few tools in it that if you didn't know what they were the booklet would not have explained it and you wouldn't even know what to do with it. But I did buy this for my son who is 11 and he is very happy with it and uses the set frequently. The case has survived being dropped and dragged around for several months.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a starter art set for my daughter. We we're both amazed at what is included with this kit.everything is real great quality. My daughter loved the modeling doll, it's really helped her with reference points and positions when drawing her anime characters in different poses. I do recommend being careful as that is the only thing in that kit that feels and looks cheap but as long as you're careful with it it works and not last a good while.
customer_reviews.author: Sinder Rianoch

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for Christmas. Won't know how good it is for a little while. Will update eventually...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Strausbaugh

customer_reviews.title: Grandson was very happy with this drawing kit
customer_reviews.text: Grandson was very happy with this drawing kit. It's pricey for what you get, but if you want a nice presentation of something that might pique their budding artistic abilities, its not a bad way to go. It's tough to get an all in one kit with good quality, so if you have someone that's already interested in this sort of art, you can do better by getting some quality pencils, such as these:
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzjarrell

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son. He loves it. He has been drawing for a while now and has a creative imagination. I wanted to get him something that would bring out the artist in him and this was definitely it. It's a beginner kit with the necessary pencils, stencils, erasers and manichean to practice with and get him started. This is a perfect gift for a kid who loves to draw, Christmas is right around the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Colon

customer_reviews.title: Good starter kit.

customer_reviews.title: Warped, cracked case with weak hardware.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product as a Christmas gift for my son, who has recently become an art fanatic. Not even a week after having it, the case will not close properly and the latches are falling apart. On one section of the case, the wood is actually separating, presenting a potential for splinters. We will be returning this product. No good!

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my niece for Christmas. She began using it the day she opened it. This is very cheep looking to begin with, but the plastic inserts fell out of the wood box on the FIRST DAY that she opened the gift! How embarrassing! Do yourself a favor and just purchase all the artistic materials separately.

product_meta.title: ROYAL BRUSH Essentials Art Sketching and Drawing Artist Set for Beginners, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Size:AssortedEssentials Beginner's Drawing and Sketching Art Set in clear view case contains everything you need to get started including a 5 in x 7 in pad, 12 color pencils, 12 compressed color sticks, 6 graphite pencils, 3 charcoal pencils, 3 blending stumps, mannequin, sandpaper block, drawing eraser, sharpener, guide and wooden carrying case. It is sold as 43 pieces per set.
feature_bullets: Beginner artist sets by royal and langnickel are ideal for the beginning artist, featuring a "how-to" guide to help teach the new medium
Art set features all the essential tools stored in a convenient wooden storage box with handle for ease of use, travel and storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,032 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
